meanings.definition: To eat a large amount greedily.
meanings.sent1: After the hike, the hungry bear was gorging on berries.
meanings.sent2: During the feast, everyone was gorging on delicious food.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was gorging on nuts like there was no tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: The bookworm was gorging on knowledge at the library.
meanings.sent5: The kids were gorging on candy at the birthday party.

meanings.definition: To fill oneself with food to excess.
meanings.sent1: At the buffet, he kept gorging on desserts.
meanings.sent2: She regretted gorging on popcorn at the movies.
meanings.sent3: The dog was gorging on treats and wagging its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The city lights were gorging on the darkness of the night.
meanings.sent5: The river was gorging on the heavy rain, swelling its banks.
